song_name: Doing It All For My Baby
lyrics:
5 contributorsdoing it all for my baby lyricsverse 1
early in the morning im still in bed
she comes to me with sweet affection
wakes me with kisses hello sleepyhead
gets me moving in the right direction
i do my best to give her love that lasts forever
it seems like everything i do im doing better

chorus 1
doing it all for my baby
cause shes as fine as she can be
im doing it all for my baby
for everything she does for me

verse 2
later in the evening its been a busy day
she lays her head upon my weary shoulder
listen to her laughing snuggle up and say
now im with you baby the loneliness is over

prechorus 2
i do my best to give her love that lasts forever
it seems like everything i do im doing better

chorus 2
doing it all for my baby
cause shes as fine as she can be
doing it all for my baby
for everything she does for me
you might also likeguitar solo

chorus 3
doing it all for my baby
cause shes as fine as she can be
doing it all for my baby
for everything she does for me
